project.name: |-- 002-statements
project.description:
Keywords: + Break Statement + Continue Statement + Goto + Labels + Switch statement
This project includes a very simple examples involving java statements.
BreakStatement: JUnit to demonstrate how you can use the break statement to get out of an enclosing do, do-while, for or switch. Also demonstrates how to use labels with the break statement.
ContinueStatement: JUnit to demonstrate how you can use the continue statement to stop the execution of the current iteration of a do, do-while, for or switch. Also demonstrates how to use labels with the continue statement.
SwitchStatement: Junit to demonstrate how you can use the switch statement with Strings.
